title: Maman Satt Rock Fronts
content: Maman salt mine is situated near Miyan√© city. In this region, there is a group of salt mines in some of which the beautiful outcrops of pure salt, as well as salt in a combination of other colorful ores, can be seen. The layers of gypsum and marl, along with layers of salt, have made unique colorings in this mine.

gallery.caption: SE26-1 :Colorful layers of salt in Maman salt mine
SE26-3 :Eye-catching colors in Maman salt deposit
